item.title: ‘Anti-Hero’ by Taylor Swift is officially among the top ten longest-running Top 10 hits by female artists in Billboard Hot 100 history.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The Grammy-winning track topped the Billboard Hot 100 for four consecutive weeks and was met with universal acclaim. It launched one of the most legendary careers in history.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: 33 years ago today, Mariah Carey released her debut single ‘Vision of Love.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘The Thirteenth Year’ premiered on Disney 24 years ago today.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The third single off ‘25’ became a Top 10 hit on both the UK Singles Chart and Billboard Hot 100, peaking at #5 and #8. It is certified Platinum in the US and has amassed over 900 million streams on Spotify.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: 7 years ago today, Adele released ‘Send My Love (To Your New Lover).’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Kim Petras announces her debut album ‘Feed The Beast’ out June 23rd.
item.author: PopBase
